thread.title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' New Trailer Previewed in Snippets
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' New Trailer Previewed in Snippets

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' New Trailer Previewed in Snippets
text:
Comments The new trailer for the seventh installment of the sci-fi movie franchise is going to premiere in full on Monday night, October 19. 
Disney keeps the anticipation high for a new trailer of " Star Wars: The Force Awakens " by teasing it in a bunch of short videos. Some of them share new footage, including one which teases an encounter between former Stormtrooper turned Resistance fighter Finn ( John Boyega ) and Poe Dameron ( Oscar Isaac ). Another new face, Rey ( Daisy Ridley ), is featured in another snippet, staring at something unseen. There's also a clip showing Rey in the woods with BB-8, looking up as some spaceships are flying over her. The Resistance gathers tomorrow.
